title: UnconfiguredDeviceDiscoveryAndAddressAssignment (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK PUBLIC FINAL UnconfiguredDeviceDiscoveryAndAddressAssignment EXTENDS BACnet.BACnetServerPluginBase IMPLEMENTS BACnet.IBACnetEventConsumer
Default implementation for Unconfigured Device Discovery and Address Assignment
This implementation rejects Network MAC Address Assignment, but accepts Device Identifier Assignment.
No matter of this, the device identifier (of the BACnet server) itself is not writable by clients.
Limitations: TrendLog and ObjectPersistence do rely on a valid device instance number at startup,
so UnconfiguredDeviceDiscoveryAndAddressAssignment can not be used in conjunction with those aspects.
Properties:
Name
NumHooks
Structure:
Name (Property)
NumHooks (Property)
